name: Conditional order granted (sole respondent)
body:
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name)),

Your ((partner)) has been granted a 'conditional order' by the court. The conditional order was formally pronounced (read out) by a judge at ((court name)) on ((date of hearing)). Your ((partner)) has also been notified. 

^((isDivorce??You are not divorced yet))((isDissolution??Your civil partnership has not been ended yet)). Your ((partner)) still has to apply for a final order which will end the ((isDivorce??marriage))((isDissolution??civil partnership)).  They can apply for a final order from ((CO pronouncement date plus 43 days)).  This will end your ((isDivorce??marriage))((isDissolution??civil partnership)). 

If they do not apply for a final order by ((CO pronouncement date plus 43 days plus 3 months)) then you can apply. You will be sent an email if they do not apply.  

You can download the conditional order from your account: ((signin url)). 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: Update on your ((isDivorce??divorce))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership))
